::Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Perndabot growls at the insolent attitude of BrightBlade. "May I remind you," 
he says, looking down at her and leveling his gun at her chest, "That you are 
on enemy territory. I suggest being more ... humble."

Reptilica and Bloodystrike cast angry glances at BrightBlade and then turn to 
Demos and Inzola. "So, you want to join us?" Reptilica asks.
